item.title: Enable/Disable jQuery buttons in Knockout with a Custom Binding Handler
item.description: Still working on those jQuery buttons. Trying to update old ASP.Net Webforms using jQuery, Knockout, and Amplify. New problem today. I was having problems getting Knockout to enable/disable my jQuery buttons using the Knockout ’enable’ bindingHandler. It would enable/disable the underlying element that I had run the .button() method on, but it had no idea about the div that jQuery had wrapped my element in, or how to handle it.

item.title: Auto Creation of jQuery Buttons using Knockout Templates
item.description: While converting ASP.NET Webforms to be more clienty using HTML 5, Knockout, and jQuery, I came across a problem.
